definition: (Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb

sentences.english: What I really do is grow grass.
Planting trees and grass can not only resist but also fix sand.
sentences.chinese: 植樹種草既能阻沙，又能固沙。

sentences.english: This paper records 3 genera 4 species lacewings from Mt. Mogan of Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文記錄了採自浙江省莫干山區4種草蛉。

sentences.english: The black cumin seed is known for its many uses.
sentences.chinese: 黑種草種子是著名的多種用途。

sentences.english: He takes up gardening after his retirement.
sentences.chinese: 退休後他以養花種草作爲消遣。

sentences.english: Water poultry industry should focus on cultivating grass to raise goose. Meanwhile, special poultry industry can be steadily enlarged.
sentences.chinese: 水禽業要加快發展種草養鵝，逐步擴大特禽生產。

sentences.english: The black cumin seed is a tiny, about 3mm long, and is hairy.
sentences.chinese: 黑種草種子是一個關於3毫米小，長，是毛茸茸的。

definition: galley proof (printing)/unimpressive/(coll.) little guy (mild insult also used as an affectionate term)
to divide into portions/to package in smaller quantities/to separate into loads
chicken ribs/sth of little value or interest/sth of dubious worth that one is reluctant to give up/to be physically weak
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
